author: Dirk Schwiebert

review: This was one of the best buys I have had in a while. Not only does it transform our ordinary flat screen into a smart tv, it does so with ease! Set up was a breeze and navigating through the apps is seamless. My favorite part was that it was completely affordable costing less than 50 dollars. I would recommend this product to anyone.
author: UnspokenWords29
